overview: A gay short film exploring sexuality: fun-packed, light-hearted film that gives usa peak into the lives of an odd couple - Barry and Drew, who like to shake things up in their relationship and sex antics by acting out many different stereo-types, some not so stereo-typed, of gay men to try and ascertain what kind of gay man is compatible with the other one on multi-levels, and will ultimately concoct the right blend for a thriving and throbbing love life. Will Barry and Drew achieve the rise they both want? Will there be a stirring within to ignite their dormant libidinous passion?
title: Resurrection
